summary: This mod removes the camera sway from attacking and equipping in 1st person view
descriptionHtml:
This mod removes the camera sway from attacking and equipping in 1st person view. The swaying from power attacks is still there since I think it\'s not over the top like the one from normal attacks and equipping.

Here\'s a vid of what it looks like : 
[youtube]xAsfy1GwwBI[/youtube]

Since each animation = 1 file, this mod is easily customizable. If you want to keep the sway from a specific animation, just remove the file corresponding to that animation in the folder : Data\\Meshes\\actors\\character\\_1stperson\\animations.

To uninstall, simply remove every file from the folder : Data\\Meshes\\actors\\character\\_1stperson\\animations
author: Maevinh
